            1022 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

            Project : Loan 1022 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

Mexico - Airports Development Project : Loan
            1022 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Mexico - Airports Development
            Project : Loan 1022 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project forms part of a National
            Airport Plan developed by the Government and consists of:
            (A) construction of seven regional airports to replace the
            existing ones in the following towns: (1) Villahermosa in
            the southeast; (2) Tuxtla Gutierrez, in the southeast; (3)
            Tapachula in the southeast; (4) Los Mochis on the west
            coast; (5) Guaymas on the west coast; (6) Minatitlan on the
            east coast; (7) Poza Rica on the east coast; (B) expansion
            of the existing airport at Campeche coast; and (C) design
            and implementation of a new cost accounting system.
